name: delegate_to_sub_bot
description: Delegate a task to a specialized sub-bot that has the tools to handle specific types of requests.

bot_name.description: The name of the sub-bot to delegate to. Must be one of the available sub-bots: potenza, targetprocess, etc.

message.description: A clear, detailed message to send to the sub-bot that includes all necessary information to complete the task. This should be a reformulation of the user's request with any additional context needed.
